summary: A small and simple script for writing LaTeX documents
name: TabLaTeX
description:
TabLaTeX is a small and very simple Vim 6.x plugin that eases editing LaTeX documents. The script is focused on fast editing and not in completeness, so only the most used features of LaTeX are supported. You might find interesting that most commands are inspired in the tab-completion feature of the bash shell.

Homepage: http://www.cavecanen.org/latex/tablatex/
install_details:
Under *nix: run the install.sh file
Other OSes: Copy the tablatex.vim file on the <vimdir>/ftplugin/tex directory

versions.release_notes:
Made the script less cheesy. Now all mappings and options are local to the buffer.

Initial folding support (only for environments, for now)
